definition: to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
absolutely ridiculous (idiom); preposterous/the height of folly

sentences.english: " Where "exactly" the word can be described as exquisite peerless.
sentences.chinese: 这里的“恰好”二字可谓精妙绝伦。

sentences.english: TV is as good as it gets because the form forces the writers to be better.
sentences.chinese: 电视剧本精彩绝伦，因为这一体制迫使作者做得更好。

sentences.english: Though it was winter , the charm was not less excellent as that in spring, summer and autumn.
sentences.chinese: 虽是冬季，景色的美妙绝伦不亚于春季，夏季和秋季。

sentences.english: The works are instructive, often beautiful and occasionally thrilling.
sentences.chinese: 这些精美绝伦的展品颇具启发性，有的甚至令人震撼。

sentences.english: Middle and Late Northern Song Dynasty carved exquisite decoration, unique style.
sentences.chinese: 北宋中晚期刻花装饰精美绝伦，独具一格。

sentences.english: But the loveliest things of beauty God ever has showed to me.
sentences.chinese: 然而美神向我展示之物竟如此精美绝伦。

sentences.english: When we say homosexuality is against nature, this is the biggest nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 若说同性恋是违背自然的，那真是荒谬绝伦了。

sentences.english: A superb bronze comes from distant China.
sentences.chinese: 精美绝伦的“铜狮”来自遥远的中国。

sentences.english: Her performance was pleasing, though by no means capital.
sentences.chinese: 她的表演虽然说不上奇妙绝伦，也还娓娓动听。

sentences.english: These pictures are beauty and delicacy, the modeling is skilful manoeuvre.
sentences.chinese: 图案精美绝伦，造型巧夺天工。

sentences.english: How exquisite the next month of the peach?
sentences.chinese: 月下桃花的绝伦又怎论之？

sentences.english: She was exquisitely fashioned in very small texture and detail.
sentences.chinese: 她每一个微小的纹理和细部都塑造得优美绝伦。

sentences.english: Afterwards, Chinese opera can envelop you in the magnigicence of another world, another time .
sentences.chinese: 尔后，中国的戏剧将你领入另一个精妙绝伦的世界。

sentences.english: If you think the Mona Lisa is stunning.
sentences.chinese: 如果你认为蒙娜莉莎的微笑精彩绝伦。

sentences.english: And that's an incredible, both book and film.
The story goes that during the Roman Empire, there was an incredibly beautiful maiden named Rhodanthe.
sentences.chinese: 在罗马帝国时代，有名叫罗丹斯的美丽绝伦的少女。

definition: out of the ordinary/out of the common run
lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
